com.binghamton.jhelp

Class Modifiers

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.binghamton.jhelp.Modifiers

  • public class Modifiers
extends java.lang.Object
    A class abstracting a set of Java modifiers

      Construct a collection of modifiers from a variable number of Modifiers
